Research
Research Interests I am interested in ergodic theory and topological dynamics, evolution semigroups in population dynamics, and the application of variational method to nonlinear PDEs in quantum mechanics.
Publications and Preprints Representation of measurable multi-dimensional flows by Lipschitz functions with Yonatan Gutman, preprint.

with Jiawei Huo and Rong Yuan, J. Dynam. Differential Equations (2023) https://doi.org/10.1007/s10884-023-10288-w
Critical point theory to isotropic discrete boundary value problems on weighted finite graphs
with Yu Tian and Tengteng Ma, J. Difference Equ. Appl. 24 (2018), no. 4, 503 - 519.
